name: HD Realistic Japanese Pears
description: High quality photorealistic mid-poly pears in two types of bowls 3 Different sets for each bowl included It's also free to fill anything with pear objects using Mass FX etc :) Archive contains all objects showed on the preview: - Pears - 4832 polys each - Glass bowl - 2544 polys + MeshSmooth (optional) - Flat ceramic bowl - 1440 polys + MeshSmooth (optional) Quads only High resolution maps (unwrapped 4096x4096) Corona 1.6.x shaders 3ds max 2012 + V-ray NON-GGX version included Quality realistic A model of Japanese pears in a flat dish and a glass bowl 3 options for filling for each dish. Fill in pears with anything using Mass FX, etc. :) In the archive everything that is on the preview: - Pears - 4832 each - Glass bowl - 2544 polygons + MeshSmooth (optional) - Ceramic dish - 3328 polygons + MeshSmooth (optional) Only quads High resolution cards (unwrapped 4096x4096) Materials for Corona 1.6.x Scene in the format 3ds max 2012 + V-Ray - NOT GGX - attached Show more
short_description:
Platform:	 3dsMax 2015 + obj
